## MapGeoTool class

添加 geojson

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MapGeoTool extends ToolBase<ToolBaseOptions, MapGeoToolEvents>
```

**Extends:** ToolBase&lt;ToolBaseOptions, [MapGeoToolEvents](./cesium.mapgeotoolevents)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

```ts
const tool = new MapGeoTool({})

tool.enable()
tool.addGeo(config, false, config.id)
```

| [clear()](./cesium.mapgeotool.clear)                 |           | 清除所有矢量                                        |
